description: Caesar's defeat sends shockwaves through the underworld. The Straw Hats gather in Building R-66 to escape, while Doflamingo sends Baby 5 and Buffalo to retrieve Caesar from Punk Hazard.

events.title: Caesar's Defeat Confirmed
events.description: Caesar Clown is shown unconscious after being defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Grizzly Magnum, flying through the facility's corridors into darkness.
events.significance: Marks the conclusion of Luffy's battle with Caesar Clown and sets up the retrieval mission from Doflamingo's crew.

quotes.text: We were supposed to kidnap him, not knock him away!
quotes.speaker: Trafalgar Law
quotes.context: Law's frustration with Luffy's approach to capturing Caesar

events.title: Underworld Brokers React to Caesar's Defeat
events.description: Various underworld brokers across the New World watch Caesar's defeat on their broadcasts, expressing shock and concern about the implications for their business dealings.
events.significance: Establishes Caesar's importance to the criminal underworld and foreshadows future conflicts involving SMILE production and Doflamingo's operations.

quotes.text: Mom should hear about this right away.
quotes.speaker: Tamago
quotes.context: Recognizing the importance of Caesar's defeat to Big Mom

events.title: Straw Hats Converge in Building R-66
events.description: The Straw Hat crew members, along with Law, G-5 Marines, and the rescued children, gather in Building R-66 to prepare their escape from Punk Hazard.
events.significance: Marks the regrouping of allies and preparation for evacuation from the dangerous facility.

quotes.speaker: Nami
quotes.context: Relief at the crew's reunion in Building R

events.title: Chopper Carries Mocha to Safety
events.description: Chopper, along with the G-5 medical squad, carries the weakened Mocha toward Building R-66, racing against time to reach safety before the poisonous gas spreads further.
events.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's commitment to saving the children and his medical responsibilities.

events.title: Brook Rescues Petrified Kin'emon
events.description: Brook carries the petrified body of Kin'emon, who was caught in the toxic gas while searching for his son Momonosuke, toward the evacuation point.
events.significance: Sets up Kin'emon's eventual rescue and reunion with Momonosuke.

events.title: Buffalo's Anime Debut
events.description: Buffalo, a member of the Donquixote Pirates, makes his first appearance in the anime as he flies toward Punk Hazard with Baby 5 riding on his back.
events.significance: Introduces a new antagonist and member of Doflamingo's crew, demonstrating his Devil Fruit ability.

events.title: Guru Guru no Mi Demonstrated
events.description: Buffalo demonstrates his Guru Guru no Mi (Spin-Spin Fruit) ability by transforming his body parts into propellers, allowing him to fly and create powerful gusts of wind.
events.significance: First showcase of the Guru Guru no Mi's abilities in the anime, establishing Buffalo's combat capabilities.

events.title: Buffalo Uses Wind Dispersal Technique
events.description: Buffalo spins his body rapidly to create a massive gust of wind that disperses the poisonous H2S gas surrounding Punk Hazard, revealing the SAD tanker ship.
events.significance: Demonstrates Buffalo's utility in combat situations and his Devil Fruit's practical applications.

events.title: Baby 5's Fiancé History Revealed
events.description: During their flight, Baby 5 complains about how Doflamingo has killed her eight fiancés and destroyed their hometowns, revealing her troubled romantic history and relationship with Doflamingo.
events.significance: Provides character depth to Baby 5 and hints at Doflamingo's controlling nature over his crew members.

quotes.text: Joker killed all eight of my fiancés!
quotes.speaker: Baby 5
quotes.context: Complaining about Doflamingo's interference in her personal life

events.title: Baby 5 and Buffalo Find Caesar's Body
events.description: After a massive explosion from the tanker, Baby 5 and Buffalo discover Caesar Clown's unconscious body ejected from the facility.
events.significance: Sets up the conflict between the Donquixote Pirates and the Straw Hat crew over Caesar's custody.

events.title: Doflamingo Orders Caesar's Recovery
events.description: Buffalo contacts Doflamingo via Den Den Mushi to report Caesar's defeat. Doflamingo immediately changes their mission from surveillance to recovering Caesar and returning to Dressrosa.
events.significance: Escalates the conflict and sets Doflamingo's crew on a collision course with the Straw Hats and Law.

quotes.text: Change of plans. Retrieve Caesar and return to Dressrosa immediately.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo
quotes.context: Ordering his subordinates to recover Caesar

events.title: General Franky Appears on Tanker Deck
events.description: General Franky suddenly emerges from the rubble on the SAD tanker ship's deck, surprising Baby 5 and Buffalo with his massive robotic form.
events.significance: Sets up the confrontation between General Franky and Doflamingo's assassins.

events.title: Doflamingo's Confident Smile
events.description: Upon learning that Caesar's body has been located, Doflamingo smiles knowingly, confident that he can continue SAD production with Caesar back under his control.
events.significance: Foreshadows Doflamingo's continued role as an antagonist and his plans for maintaining control over the SMILE trade.

quotes.text: We were supposed to kidnap him, not knock him away!
quotes.speaker: Trafalgar Law

quotes.text: Mom should hear about this right away.
quotes.speaker: Tamago
quotes.context: Recognizing Caesar's defeat importance to Big Mom

quotes.text: Joker killed all eight of my fiancés!
quotes.speaker: Baby 5

quotes.text: Change of plans. Retrieve Caesar and return to Dressrosa immediately.
quotes.speaker: Doflamingo

themes.description: Caesar's defeat sends ripples throughout the underworld, demonstrating how one person's power can affect the criminal economy.
themes.symbolism: The broadcast of Caesar's defeat symbolizes the transparency and interconnectedness of the underworld.

themes.description: Baby 5's complaints about Doflamingo killing her fiancés highlight the controlling and abusive nature of his leadership style.
themes.symbolism: Baby 5's inability to maintain relationships due to Doflamingo's interference represents the crew members' lack of autonomy.

characterSpotlights.development: Buffalo debuts as a loyal member of the Donquixote Pirates, showcasing his Devil Fruit abilities and comedic personality alongside Baby 5.
keyActions: Flies to Punk Hazard with Baby 5

characterSpotlights.development: Baby 5's character is further developed through revelation of her troubled romantic history and relationship with Doflamingo.
quotes: Joker killed all eight of my fiancés!

characterSpotlights.development: Doflamingo's controlling nature and strategic thinking are highlighted through his orders and past actions.
keyActions: Smiles confidently about continuing SMILE production
quotes: Change of plans. Retrieve Caesar and return to Dressrosa immediately.

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extended the scenes of Chopper and Brook's journey to Building R-66 compared to the manga.
The anime omitted Devil Fruit designations in the character information boxes for Baby 5 and Buffalo.

trivia.fact: This episode marks Buffalo's debut in the anime, introducing the Guru Guru no Mi Devil Fruit.
Episode 618 achieved a 7.9% TV rating in Japan, ranking 6th in viewership for its time slot.
The episode adapts Chapter 692 pages 6-19, with the previous episode covering pages 3-6 of the same chapter.
This episode aired on Toonami on June 4, 2023, nearly 10 years after its original Japanese broadcast.
